ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnUnpaidLossesGro.description: Amount before valuation allowance of reinsurance recoverables for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid, and for amounts expected based upon statistical projections and other measures of incurred losses and loss settlement expenses which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.label: Related Party Transaction, Amounts of Transaction
RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.description: Amount of transactions with related party during the financial reporting period.

ReserveForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpense.label: Reserve for Losses and Loss Adjustment Expenses (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReserveForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpense.description: Alternate concept name for the aggregate amount of policy reserves (provided for future obligations including unpaid claims and claims adjustment expenses) and policy benefits (liability for future policy benefits) as of the balance sheet date; grouped amount of all the liabilities associated with the company's insurance policies.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenueFromRelatedParties.label: Revenue from Related Parties
RevenueFromRelatedParties.description: Amount of revenue, fees and commissions earned from transactions between (a) a parent company and its subsidiaries; (b) subsidiaries of a common parent; (c) an entity and trusts for the benefit of employees, for example, but not limited to, pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; (d) an entity and its principal, owners, management, or members of their immediate families; and (e) affiliates.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipAfterTra.label: Sale of Stock, Percentage of Ownership after Transaction
SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipAfterTra.description: Percentage of subsidiary's or equity investee's stock owned by parent company after stock transaction.

SalesCommissionsAndFees.label: Sales Commissions and Fees
SalesCommissionsAndFees.description: Primarily represents commissions incurred in the period based upon the sale by commissioned employees or third parties of the entity's goods or services, and fees for sales assistance or product enhancements performed by third parties (such as a distributor or value added reseller).

SeparateAccountAssets.label: Separate Account Asset
SeparateAccountAssets.description: Amount of asset at fair value held for benefit of separate account policyholder.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTra.label: Share-based Goods and Nonemployee Services Transaction, Cash Flow Effects (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ShareBasedGoodsAndNonemployeeServicesTra.description: The amount by which the statement of cash flows was affected by a transaction in which equity securities were issued to pay for goods or nonemployee services.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Nonvested Options Forfeited, Number of Shares

SharePrice.label: Share Price
SharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks of a company.

SharesOutstanding.label: Shares, Outstanding
SharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares issued which are neither cancelled nor held in the treasury.

ShortTermInvestments.label: Short-term Investments
ShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Net Income Amount
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.description: Amount of net income for the period determined using accounting principles prescribed or permitted by insurance regulators.

StockDividendsShares.label: Stock Dividends, Shares
StockDividendsShares.description: Number of shares of common and preferred stock issued as dividends during the period. Excludes stock splits.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversi.label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Stock Split, Conversion Ratio
StockholdersEquityNoteStockSplitConversi.description: Ratio applied to the conversion of stock split, for example but not limited to, one share converted to two or two shares converted to one.

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesReverseStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Reverse Stock Splits
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesReverseStoc.description: Reduction in the number of shares during the period as a result of a reverse stock split.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Dividend
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.description: Value of stock issued to shareholders as a dividend during the period.

StockOptionPlanExpense.label: Stock or Unit Option Plan Expense
StockOptionPlanExpense.description: Amount of noncash expense for option under share-based payment arrangement.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationLiabili.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Loss, Claim and Loss Expense
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationLiabili.description: Amount of reserve for future policy claim payable and loss expense to be incurred, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SurplusNotes.label: Surplus Notes
SurplusNotes.description: Financial instruments issued by insurance entities (surplus notes) that are includable in surplus for statutory accounting purposes as prescribed or permitted by state laws and regulations that are liabilities of the issuer.

TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReporti.label: Translation Adjustment Functional to Reporting Currency, Increase (Decrease), Gross of Tax
TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReporti.description: Amount of cumulative translation gain (loss), before tax, from translating foreign currency financial statements into the reporting currency.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

UnearnedPremiums.label: Unearned Premiums
UnearnedPremiums.description: Carrying amount of premiums written on insurance contracts that have not been earned as of the balance sheet date.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

UnrealizedLossOnSecurities.label: Unrealized Loss on Securities
UnrealizedLossOnSecurities.description: The increase (decrease), resulting in a loss, in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of securities held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Net
ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

VariableInterestEntityInitialConsolidati.label: Variable Interest Entity, Initial Consolidation, Gain (Loss)
VariableInterestEntityInitialConsolidati.description: The gain (loss) recognized on initial consolidation of a variable interest entity (VIE) when the VIE is not a business (as defined).

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

DeferredTaxAssetsDerivativeInstruments.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Derivative Instruments
DeferredTaxAssetsDerivativeInstruments.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from derivative instruments.

DeferredTaxAssetsOther.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsOther.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences, classified as other.

DirectPremiumsWritten.label: Direct Premiums Written
DirectPremiumsWritten.description: Amount, before premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums written.

IncreaseDecreaseInDepositOtherAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deposit Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInDepositOtherAssets.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in moneys or securities given as security including, but not limited to, contract, escrow, or earnest money deposits, retainage (if applicable), deposits with clearing organizations and others, collateral, or margin deposits.

LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefits.label: Liability for Future Policy Benefit, before Reinsurance
LiabilityForFuturePolicyBenefits.description: Amount, before effect of reinsurance, of present value of future benefit to be paid to or on behalf of policyholder and related expense less present value of future net premium receivable under insurance contract.

NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSaleOf.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Sale of Parent Equity Interest
NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSaleOf.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from sale of a portion of the parent's controlling interest.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Weighted Average Volatility Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Rate of weighted-average expected volatility for award under share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures and Expirations in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: For presentations that combine terminations, the number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan or that expired.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures and Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price of options that were either forfeited or expired.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested, Number of Shares

FinancialInstrumentsOwnedMortgagesMortga.label: Financial Instruments, Owned, Mortgages, Mortgage-backed and Asset-backed Securities, at Fair Value
FinancialInstrumentsOwnedMortgagesMortga.description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in mortgages, mortgage backed securities (investment instruments that represent ownership of an undivided interest in a group of mortgages, where principal and interest from the individual mortgages are used to pay investors' principal and interest on the mortgage backed security) and asset-backed securities that are primarily paid from the cash flows of a discrete pool of receivables or other financial assets (such as credit-card receivables), either fixed or revolving, that by their terms convert into cash within a finite time period. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

MinorityInterestDecreaseFromRedemptions.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Redemptions or Purchase of Interests
MinorityInterestDecreaseFromRedemptions.description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest (for example, but not limited to, redeeming or purchasing the interests of noncontrolling shareholders, issuance of shares (interests) by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to the parent entity for other than cash, and a buyback of shares (interest) by the non-wholly owned subsidiary from the noncontrolling interests).

MortgageServicingRightsMSRImpairmentReco.label: Mortgage Servicing Rights (MSR) Impairment (Recovery)
MortgageServicingRightsMSRImpairmentReco.description: The adjustment to the carrying value of the rights retained or purchased to service mortgages. These adjustments are made when the estimate of the fair value is changed. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Portion Recognized in Earnings
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security, recognized in earnings.

DebtInstrumentCollateralAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Collateral Amount
DebtInstrumentCollateralAmount.description: Amount of assets pledged to secure a debt instrument.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Impairment Losses
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from estimated impairment losses.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Credit Losses on Debt Securities Held
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: The cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings related to debt securities held for which a portion of an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate, Maximum
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the maximum percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate, Minimum
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the minimum percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate, Maximum
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The maximum risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate, Minimum
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The minimum risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Nonvested, Number of Shares

AdvancesFromFederalHomeLoanBanks.label: Advances from Federal Home Loan Banks
AdvancesFromFederalHomeLoanBanks.description: Amount of borrowings as of the balance sheet date from the Federal Home Loan Bank, which are primarily used to cover shortages in the required reserve balance and liquidity shortages.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesCurrent.label: Long-term Federal Home Loan Bank Advances, Current
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesCurrent.description: The current portion of Federal Home Loan Bank borrowings initially due beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherPolicyholderFunds.label: Other Policyholder Funds
OtherPolicyholderFunds.description: Amount due to policyholders for funds held that are returnable under the terms of insurance contracts, classified as other.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options or other stock instruments for which the right to exercise has lapsed under the terms of the plan agreements.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest exercisable options that may be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options of the plan that expired.
